articles.title: Following these 8 steps for heart health may slow biological aging by 6 years, research shows - CBS News
articles.description: The analysis used the American Heart Association's "Life's Essential 8" checklist​, a list of lifestyle behaviors, to determine individuals' levels of heart health.
articles.content:
Want to live longer? New research shows a link between strong heart health and slower biological aging — and there are certain steps that can help you get there.
